decision_conditions: <p>Within 1 month from the grant of planning permission all cooking facilities (including, but not limited to oven and hob) shall be removed from the building and thereafter retained as such.</p>

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpFirst" style="margin-bottom: 0cm; line-height: normal;">The detached outbuilding hereby permitted shall not be occupied at any
time other than for purposes incidental to the residential use of the occupiers
of 133 Carmelite Road, Harrow Weald, Harrow, HA3 5LU and shall at no point be
used as primary living accommodation, for rental purposes (short or long term
let) or any other similar uses.</p>

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpFirst" style="margin-bottom: 0cm; line-height: normal;">Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning
(General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any order revoking and
re-enacting that order with or without modification), no windows or doors,
other than those shown on the approved plans, shall be installed in the side or
rear elevations of the hereby permitted outbuilding, without the prior
permission in writing of the local planning authority.</p>

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpFirst" style="margin-bottom: 0cm; line-height: normal;">The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance
with the following approved plans and documents:</p><p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpFirst" style="margin-bottom: 0cm; line-height: normal;"><br></p><p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpFirst" style="margin-bottom: 0cm; line-height: normal;">Proposed
As Built Plans and Elevations – 622-23-03 Rev A (Received 07/08/23).</p><p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpFirst" style="margin-bottom: 0cm; line-height: normal;">Location
Plan – Dated 03-Aug-2023</p>

<p class="MsoListParagraphCxSpFirst" style="margin-bottom: 0cm; line-height: normal;">The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the
expiration of three years from the date of this permission.</p>
description: Use of outbuilding as self-contained annexe incidental to main dwelling
